name: Mirror World
description: A mystical mirror has created a parallel
and twisted versions of reality exist.
Enter this mirror world to retrieve
stolen artifacts and restore the balance
between our realm and its dark reflection.

dialogs.start1: Beware - the mirror world shows our darkest reflections.
dialogs.start2: Artifacts have been stolen and taken to the other side.
dialogs.start3: Only someone pure of heart can navigate that twisted realm.
dialogs.progress1: Your shadow doubles fight with your own skills - be careful!
dialogs.progress2: Each artifact retrieved weakens the mirror's hold on reality.
dialogs.complete1: The dark mirror is destroyed! The parallel dimension fades.
dialogs.complete2: Balance is restored between the worlds - well done.
